profile:
Coast Wide Flood & Fire Restorations provides award winning 24/7 emergency restoration on the Sunshine Coast. Founded by Kris Maharaj and Chris Campbell with a mutual desire to provide superior flood and fire restoration service, we have over 50 years of combined experience in the remediation, restoration and construction sectors. Our fully-qualified team of IICRC certified restoration technicians have the knowledge and experience to tackle any disaster.

Our expert rapid response team is ready to respond on a momentâ€™s notice, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year! We are positioned to set the bar higher for total restoration services on the Sunshine Coast with our industry leading business model of premier customer service and professional workmanship. Our state of the art equipment and exceptional customer service enable us to offer both insurers and property owners peace of mind. Let us be there to restore order and make things right. Coast Wide Fire & Flood Restorations cater to clients from Port Mellon to Earls Cove so make us your first call.
